doc:
Sam Anderson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Anderson 0 Sam Anderson (born May 13, 1945) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Sam Gorpley on Perfect Strangers, as dentist Bernard Nadler on Lost, and as Holland Manners on Angel. He also played in "Star Trek: The Next Generation" and the television show "Friends" Sam_Anderson ( born May_13_,_1945 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_roles as Sam_Gorpley on Perfect_Strangers , as dentist_Bernard_Nadler on Lost , and as Holland_Manners on Angel .
